data.text:
Chris Davis

Chris Davis

Ht./Wt.:

5-10 / 157

Class:

Senior

Hometown:

Summary

Media

Historical

Summary

Biography

JUNIOR (2007-08): Played in two tournaments posting a 76.33 scoring average ... Recorded a low round of 71 at the Buccaneer Invitational ... Finished tied for 28th at the Southeastern Intercollegiate ... Finished tied for 60th at the Buccaneer Invitiational.

SOPHOMORE (2006-07): Played in five tournaments posting a 77.46 stroke average ... Fired a career-low one-under-par 71 at the Buccaneer Invitational ... Tied for 28th at the Buccaneer Invitational ... Tied for 30th at the Sunshine State Conference tournament ... Earned team Sportsmanship Award.

Played in five tournaments posting a 77.46 stroke average ... Fired a career-low one-under-par 71 at the Buccaneer Invitational ... Tied for 28th at the Buccaneer Invitational ... Tied for 30th at the Sunshine State Conference tournament ... Earned team Sportsmanship Award.

FRESHMAN (2005-06): Played in five tournaments posting a 77.43 scoring average with a low round of 73 ... Tied for 16th at the AASU Pirate Invitational … Tied for 24th at the NSU Spring Classic ... Was awarded team’s Sportsmanship Award.

Played in five tournaments posting a 77.43 scoring average with a low round of 73 ... Tied for 16th at the AASU Pirate Invitational … Tied for 24th at the NSU Spring Classic ... Was awarded team’s Sportsmanship Award.

High School: Attended Heritage Academy ... Finished 13th at the Plantation Inn Florida Collegians World Tour (FCWT) event ... Finished 12th at the World Woods Tournament in Clearwater, Fla. ... Finished first at the Emirates Men’s Summer Open and the Arabian Ranches Open ... Finished fourth at Shiek Rashid Trophy ... Winner of Golf Psychology Gold Award ... Three-year member of the United Arab Emirates Junior Golf team.

Attended Heritage Academy ... Finished 13th at the Plantation Inn Florida Collegians World Tour (FCWT) event ... Finished 12th at the World Woods Tournament in Clearwater, Fla. ... Finished first at the Emirates Men’s Summer Open and the Arabian Ranches Open ... Finished fourth at Shiek Rashid Trophy ... Winner of Golf Psychology Gold Award ... Three-year member of the United Arab Emirates Junior Golf team.

Personal: Son of Duncan and Lolita Davis ... Two sisters ... Majoring in business management.
